title: OSE-20-CreateEscortingRequest-Request.schema
description: Schema for escort quote request sent by BRM to escort provider

quoteRef.description: Unique Id generated for this quote request. Its the same as OSE booking requestId

requestAuthoriser.description: Details of the person/case worker who raised this request.

subjects.description: The person/s who needs to be escorted

additionalInformation.description: Extra information for agent. For e.g. Baggage needs to be collected en-route

requester.description: Basic contact details of the requester and/or the team

groupName.description: Group name to contact if named contact not available.

travelDetails.description: Target date range, destination, departure and various restrictions

preferredDepartureDate.description: Preferred date for OSE to be made. Date in the ISO-8601 format of [YYYY]-[MM]-[DD

latestDepartureDate.description: Latest date that OSE can be made (optional). Date in the ISO-8601 format of [YYYY]-[MM]-[DD

flightType.description: Preferred flight type (eg Direct flight preferred)

departureAirport.description: The departure airport(s) to be used (free text)

arrivalAirport.description: The arrival airport(s) to be used (free text)

airlineRestrictions.description: Restrictions on which airlines that can be used

refundableTickets.description: Whether or not flight tickets should be refundable

extraInformation.description: Any other information pertinent to the quote request

isRestricted.description: Whether or not restriction applies to this quote request

departureDate.description: Departure date of the specific flights

subject.description: Subject details. person Id is always present. Mostly HO OR Port Reference is present

personId.description: Person id found in the cid which is the same as CEPR from Atlas

portReference.description: Port Reference Number if present. Used in case of transport from Ferry etc

firstName.description: Given Name of the subject including any middle name

lastName.description: Family Name of the subject. May be known or not

aliases.description: Alternative Names of the subject if any

nationality.description: Nationality of the person from CID. e.g. Angola, British Citizen

dateOfBirth.description: Date in the ISO-8601 format yyyy-MM-dd. Is it mandatory?

spotterRequired.description: Whether or not a spotter is required at the destination airport

previousFailedRemovalDetails.description: Details about any previous failed removals of the person

failedReturn.description: Indicates if the person has been failed to return previously

outstandingBarriers.description: Any legal , documentation or process issues outstanding

risksPosed.description: Risks are provided by the caseworker in BRM

languages.description: Languages spoken or understood by the returnee that may assist transportation

references.description: Any references that are required. For e.g. IFB Reference

notes.description: Person specific notes applicable to the returnee

religion.description: Details about the religion of the person

risk.description: Risks associated with the returnee that caseworker decides to shared with CWT and Mitie OSE Team

riskCode.description: This will be the Risk code e.g. Acdt, Arson etc

riskDescription.description: Descriptions for the codes e.g. Existing Medical Condition, Escape Risk

riskStartDate.description: Date in the ISO-8601 format of YYYY-MM-DD for when the risk starts

riskEndDate.description: Date in the ISO-8601 format of YYYY-MM-DD for when the risk ends

additionalInformation.description: Agent entered information e.g. High BP, Burglary etc.

reference.description: Any references associated with the returnee that caseworker decides to shared with CWT and Mitie OSE Team

code.description: Unique Reference Code e.g. NOMSREF, HO_FILE_REF etc

referenceValue.description: Value assigned to the returnee for the code. e.g. V34543587

shortDescription.description: Short Description for the codes e.g. NOMS Reference

longDescription.description: Long Description for the codes e.g. National Offender Management System (NOMS) Reference

creationDate.description: Date in the ISO-8601 format yyyy-MM-dd when the reference is created

expiryDate.description: Date in the ISO-8601 format yyyy-MM-dd when the reference is expiring

detentionDetails.description: Whether or not subject is is detention and details about the place of detention

isDetained.description: Indicates if the person is detained

location.description: Place where the person in detained

date.description: Date in the ISO-8601 format yyyy-MM-dd.
